mapper.select: Select * From songListInformation WHERE mail = #{ mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and songPath = #{ songPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and songListName = #{ songListName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO songListInformation(songListName,mail,songPath,time,songStuts) values (#{songListName,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{mail,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{songPath,jdbcType = VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{songStuts,jdbcType = VARCHAR})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM songListInformation WHERE mail = #{ mail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and songListName = #{ songListName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
DELETE FROM songListInformation WHERE songPath = #{ songPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
